About

Contact

     Hello I’m Roxanne a retired Special needs teacher of 30 years. I began painting 8 years ago as a relaxer. I would find various pieces of furniture on the curb and paint them very whimsically. Since starting with furniture I decided to paint with acrylic on canvas. Found out that people liked my paintings and began to sell them to family and friends.

     In these 8 years I have begun to use resin, acrylic and a stain gel called Unicorn Spit. I enjoy doing what is called “dirty pours” on canvas; well, really any type of material from metal to glass to wood. I love using molds for my resin. Making key chains, dominos, trinket bowls and much more.

     I’ve done custom work also. I’ve made cow skulls with semi-precious stones then sealed in resin, a ram skull decorated with flowers made out of wooden flowers to a dirty pour on a 5ft by 5ft canvas.

If you need a charcuterie board I can custom make them too.
